I feel that effective communication is the key. That's what I did when I realized that our organization's cooperation process was lacking a defined path. So our team built a "DEFAULT" communication flow between the functions of the system.


With the help of this flow chart, you can demonstrate your team what they need to prepare, doing and sharing when working on project. For the record, this flow focuses on the designers and serves as a basic reference. Of course you may change the approach when you're in the midst of something amazing.
